items.sentence: My aunt had been in the hospital for a week when I visited her.
Tom drank a lot last night and is a bit hung over this morning.
Tom ended up not buying the house he was thinking about buying.
Tom and Mary were in the kitchen together all morning, cooking.
I know what today is. It\'s your thirtieth birthday, isn\'t it?
Everyone should choose at least one poem and learn it by heart.
Tom said he didn\'t believe that Mary would do that by herself.
We sang Christmas songs in the car all the way to Tom\'s house.
I\'m sure Tom has already spent a lot of the money we gave him.
I\'ve been a public school teacher for the past thirteen years.
